question: write a letter requesting the teacher to conduct exams
text: Hope you are fine with good health,I am writing this letter to remind you about the assessment to be taken at the end of this month.Although,As decided in our last session,Firstly, the final Exams date is due on next month 5th'March'2022.However,all the Mock test sheets that were shared by you have been completed.Only, the last topic which is about the Sources of Energy is left to have a grip on that.which I am sure I will complete by this week.

Moreover,Our group has been studying day and night to work on our Practical theory,Somehow,We feel there is still a few topics are left to discuss.Secondly,all of us are on the same pace that If our test could conducted on the scheduled date we won't be able to overcome the tough topics.In that case,We have mutual consent that we all are  prepared for the Mock test period by end of this month.

However, On the said time,we all will reach at Coaching centre around 10 AM,Please let me confirm the day so that I could make everyone gather.Thirdly,I  also would like to know ,When will our Practical held and shall we all come prepared with our laboratory pieces of equipment on the same time.

Lastly,I would like to thank you on behalf of our whole group that we all are so equipped now with the knowledge and learning that you have shared with us.Eventually at the deadline of the day it's all your efforts that today we are well learned and ready for the Final exams.
Thank you and please share and confirm the assigned date as mentioned above.
